title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hatch Schemes and Scores In The Darnell Bros Garment Factory
content:
The Darnell Bros Garment Factory will be available to purchase once mariner-turned-criminal mastermind Pavel contacts you.

Owning the Garment Factory unlocks The FIB Files, 10 new spaces for your Personal Vehicles, fast travel to and from various locations around Los Santos, plus exclusive mods for your Terrorbyte and a source of passive income.

Purchase the Garment Factory from Maze Bank Foreclosures or walk up to the “For Sale” sign outside the property.
